sense.def:
The tip of something
je končni del nečesa dolgega in ozkega.

seg.quote: He was hanging by his finger tips from a window frame.

sense.def:
To tip an object
pomeni premakniti predmet tako, da ne stoji več navpično ali pokončno.

seg.quote: He tipped his soup bowl towards himself.

sense.def:
To tip something somewhere
pomeni nekaj hitro in brez previdnosti nekam stresti.

seg.quote: He tipped the contents of the rucksack out on to the floor.

sense.def:
A tip
je kraj, kjer se zbirajo smeti;

A tip
je denar, ki ga damo nekogu, na primer natakarju ali taksistu, kot dodatno nagrado za delo, ki ga je opravil.

seg.quote: The woman gave me a dollar tip.

sense.def:
To tip someone
pomeni nekomu dati napitnino.

A tip
je koristen nasvet ali podatek.

seg.quote: He consulted books by well-known tennis players for tips on basic techniques.

sense.def:
Kar je
the tip of the iceberg
, je samo zelo majhen del veliko večje težave.

To tip someone off
pomeni nekomu posredovati podatke ali ga opozoriti na nekaj, pogosto zasebno ali na skrivaj.

seg.quote: The burglars were tipped off by a lookout and escaped.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
tips over
ali
to tip something over
pomeni, da se nečesa dotaknemo tako, da pade ali se prekucne.

seg.quote: She tipped the pan over and a dozen fish flopped out.
